channel.title: Knative on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Knative on Personal Blog

item.title: RPi with K3S with Knative
item.description: The process # Use Raspberry Pi OS # Install OS # Download the Raspberry Pi OS Lite OS, extract the zip file Install it to the SD Card Instructions diskutil list` # Get disk# diskutil unmountDisk /dev/diskN sudo dd bs=1m if=path_of_your_image.img of=/dev/rdiskN; sync sudo diskutil eject /dev/rdiskN replacing N with the disk number SSH # Connect the SD Card again For SSH sudo touch /Volumes/boot/ssh For Wifi link ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev country=<Insert 2 letter ISO 3166-1 country code here> update_config=1 network={ ssid="<Name of your wireless LAN>" psk="<Password for your wireless LAN>" } into /Volumes/boot/wpa_supplicant.
